message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was hoping we could come to a better agreement. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1125000.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1080000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I understand you're trying to save money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1110000.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1090000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
